    • move

      public abstract boolean move(int newx, int newy, Piece[][] pane)
      chess move to newx and newy if there has a chess in path, return false Use right way to move for each type of chess
      Parameters:
      newx - new x
      newy - new y
      Returns:
      true if piece can move to new location, false if not
